CustomField.description: This is a hidden field that indicates that the system has already created the Advisory Board #1 dependent marketing campaigns for this event. It is used to prevent the system from automatically creating these campaigns again a second time. Ticket #34107 / Used in Process Builder "Event - Create Campaigns (Advisory Board #1)"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a hidden field that indicates that the system has already created the Advisory Board #1 dependent marketing campaigns for this event. It is used to prevent the system from automatically creating these campaigns again a second time.
CustomField.label: Campaigns Created - Advisory Board #1
